TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed RowCallback extends System.MulticastDelegate

Docs.param: The data to retrieve from the provider.
Docs.summary: References the method to call when retrieving row data from a provider.

remarks.format:
## Remarks When a Web Parts control implements the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.IWebPartRow> interface and serves as a provider in a Web Parts connection, the connection or transformer must retrieve the row data from the provider. The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.RowCallback> delegate represents the method to call for retrieving the provider data.
The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.IWebPartRow.GetRowData%2A> method contains a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.RowCallback> delegate parameter. The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.IWebPartRow.GetRowData%2A> method is used in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.RowToFieldTransformer> class and the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.RowToParametersTransformer> class to retrieve row data for transformation.
